snippet.title: Touhou 6 - The Embodiment of Scarlet Devil - No Bombs Lunatic 1cc
snippet.description:
Uploaded mainly to test Youtube's new time limit shenanigans. Failed pretty much all the hard stuff but eh.

So yeah, a 1cc of EoSD on lunatic without ever bombing. 
EoSD is by far the hardest Windows Touhou game to 1cc without bombing. The game gives you the least amount of lives of any Windows game and it has a lot of brutal patterns. Combining this with the huge amount of randomness that will keep you on your toes all the way through.

The reason I choose ReimuA here is because she has the easiest Patchy battle. Sure the rest of the game is a bit harder because she does so little damage and a few points require some luck because of this, but the Patchy battle is so brutal with other characters that it more than makes up for it.
